doc:
Robert Gordon (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Robert_Gordon_(actor) 0 Robert Gordon (March 3, 1895–October 26, 1971), born Robert Gordon Duncan, was an American silent film actor. He was born in Belleville, Kansas and died at the age of 76 in Victorville, California. He is credited with appearances in 35 films from 1917 to 1949. Robert_Gordon ( March_3_,_1895 – October_26_,_1971 ) , born Robert_Gordon_Duncan , was an_American_silent_film_actor . He was_born in Belleville , Kansas and died at the_age of 76 in Victorville , California . He is_credited with appearances in 35_films from 1917 to 1949 .
